name: Akmal Sufian
title: Frontend Engineer
subtitle: Systems & Architecture
background: I engineer high-performance frontend systems. My focus is on architectural scalability, rendering optimization, and developer experience. I move beyond simple UI implementation to build resilient, type-safe, and observable applications. I specialize in the Vue ecosystem, WebGL integration, and bridging the gap between design intent and engineering reality.

traits.title: Systems Thinking
traits.description: I design component hierarchies and state management patterns that remain maintainable at scale, prioritizing long-term stability over short-term velocity.

traits.title: Performance First
traits.description: Zero tolerance for layout shifts or frame drops. I optimize bundle sizes, implement aggressive lazy-loading, and profile rendering cycles to ensure 60fps.

traits.title: Product Engineering
traits.description: I align technical decisions with business metrics. Every architectural choice is a trade-off made to support product goals and user retention.
